title: Vicky Pattison takes a swipe at 'toxic and insecure' ex-fiancé John Noble
text:
She has faced extremely well-publicised love woes.

Yet Vicky Pattison remains determined in her search for her happily ever after, as she gushed over boyfriend Ercan Ramadan during an appearance on Loose Women on Thursday, while also lamenting her catastrophic engagement to John Noble.

The former Geordie Shore star, 31, could not speak highly enough of the fleeting TOWIE star however confessed she does not want to 'scare him' with the prospect of babies, despite that being in her mindset following her romance with John.

Moving on: Vicky Pattison remains determined in her search for her happily ever after, as she gushed over boyfriend Ercan Ramadan during an appearance on Loose Women on Thursday, while also lamenting her catastrophic engagement to John Noble

Vicky started dating Ercan three months after splitting from her former fiancé John Noble in November. Yet in March it was reported that the reality star had called things off with the former TOWIE hunk.

According to The Sun, Vicky decided to end things with Ercan because she felt they got together too soon after her split from John, who cheated on her.

The source said: 'Vicky has decided to call things off with Ercan because it was all moving too quickly. She felt like it was too soon after her split from John Noble to get so involved with someone else.

'She really fancies Ercan and they are very much still friends but it's just not the right time for a serious romance. They might end up getting back together in the future.' Yet just days later the duo rekindled their romance as they enjoyed a dinner date.

Happy days: The former Geordie Shore star, 31, could not speak highly enough of the fleeting TOWIE star however confessed she does not want to 'scare him' with the prospect of babies

Way back when: Vicky insisted that while she would typically choose an alpha-male, they tended to be hiding deep insecurities

Now, it seems things are very much on the up for the couple as Stacey Solomon asked if she’s in love, to which Vicky responded: 'I am always in love. We are very honest very open we're enjoying ourselves now in the position we are in'.

On wanting kids, she said: 'Since the last time I’ve seen you guys things have totally changed I think I never imagined myself having children I didn’t think that was on the cards for me.

'When I was in my last relationship, moving in with someone, getting engaged, getting married, the possibility of having children… once you’ve decided you want children it’s hard to turn that tap off.'

Back on: According to The Sun, Vicky decided to end things with Ercan because she felt they got together too soon after her split from John, who cheated on her

Speaking about Ercan, Vicky gushed: 'He's so nice, he's just so nice. I think more often than not, I’ve gone for the alpha male type they’re very loud and they seem confident and you scratch the surface...

'The loudest person into the room is more often than not the most insecure. I have to deal with the fallout of them competing with me and my career. The relationship has become toxic but Ercan is so nice, I didn’t know they make them like that'.

Vicky and John split when images and footage emerged showing John getting up close and personal with a bevy of other women.

Heartache: Earlier this year, the reality star opened up about the split to MailOnline and said she doesn't think about her former flame anymore

Earlier this year, the reality star opened up about the split to MailOnline and said she doesn't think about her former flame anymore.

She said: 'I don't think about him anymore. I don't know that man. He's rang me a couple of times since. Unfortunately we own a house together...

'He's very keen to get the money out of this house and have his ring back and just wanting to move on with his life. I think the ring is cursed, mate...'

John's proposal was Vicky's second, after her Geordie Shore co-star Ricci Guarnaccio proposed to her during a Cancun MTV special in 2012.

Past: Vicky and John split when images and footage emerged showing John getting up close and personal with a bevy of other women

She said: 'Clocking the engagements up aren't I? I think it would be dead easy to become twisted and I've not had the best relationship with men and I've had some shockers but if I changed myself they'd be winning...

'I love so much and probably too much. If I really care about them they become more important than me. That's a lot for some people to take but if I changed, they'd be winning...

'If I can love the wrong men as much as I have, imagine how much I'll love the right one, it'll be amazing. The best revenge is living well. I'm not going to give up.'
